mdRecord.dcterms:title: First Light Theatre: 1997 Summer Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1997 Summer Season of the First Light Theatre. Programs include: Fabulous Fables and Fantastic Tales, June 9-21 | Cinderella, Where's your Fella?, June 23- July 5 | Puss in Boots, July 7-19 | Hercules, July 21- Aug 2 | Virginia Highlands Festival, Aug 5-9 | Romeo and Juliet, Aug 11-16. First Light at Wytheville Community College: Cinderella, Where's your Fella?, June 26 | Puss in Boots, July 10 | Hercules, July 24. First Light at Mountain Home Auditorium: Programs include Fabulous Fables and Fantastic Tales, June 19 | Cinderella, Where's your Fella?, July 3 | Puss in Boots, July 17 | Hercules, July 31.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
